thread.title: Great history, horrendous service
thread.title_full: Great history, horrendous service - Review of Les Bains, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tylermcd
title: Great history, horrendous service
text: No personalized greeting at check in. I had requested an early check-in and wasn't given a room til after 4pm. Just seemed to not want to deal with me when I tried to ask questions. Loud music in the bar/courtyard til 2am that was easily heard in the room.
